attributes.action: Put more emphasis on St. George's Day, proud to be English born and bred (B. B. E. Bring back England)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that this country is becoming less and less 'English'. London, historically known for being the capital of England, in my and many other peoples opinions is now simply a tourist hotspot with the english culture being driven out of it to the suburbs. Living in Sheffield I see the celebrations for St. Patrick's Day with Guinness Tents and promotions everywhere, with everybody joining in. But when it comes to St George's Day the nation seems to turn a blind eye and its overshadowed by St. Patrick's Day, All I'm asking is that the country recognise on April 23rd its a time to look back at our heritage, how England used to be without all the problems that are arising today.

Bring . Back . England

rejection.details: Petition title must only contain a request for action
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
